arts.sum: Ridle Baku's second-half goal proved decisive as Wolfsburg won 1-0 against Union Berlin, securing a first home win of the season for Ralph Hasenhüttl's side. Wolfsburg entered the match seeking their first home win of the season, while Union Berlin aimed to improve their position in the Bundesliga table.

arts.ttl: 15:30 Kickoffs: Leverkusen, Hoffenheim, Dortmund, Stuttgart, and Wolfsburg all victorious
arts.sum: There were no draws in the latest set of five Bundesliga 15:30 kickoffs. Czech internationals Patrik Schick (Leverkusen) and Adam Hlozek (Hoffenheim) were instrumental in helping their teams complete comeback victories. Elsewhere, Stuttgart and Dortmund took care of business with clinical home wins. Wolfsburg also secured their first home win of the season. Coverage of all five simultaneous kickoffs can be found below.

arts.ttl: Wolfsburg vs Union Berlin preview: Die Wölfe look to keep unbeaten run
arts.sum: Wolfsburg and Union Berlin are positioned six places apart in the Bundesliga standings as they prepare to face off in Saturday's match at the Volkswagen Arena for gameweek 11.
Action from the German top flight returns after the international break and Alex Jack is on hand to provide score predictions for all nine Bundesliga games this weekend.

arts.ttl: Preview: Wolfsburg vs. Union Berlin - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Wolfsburg and Union Berlin, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
